result.execSummary:
The defendant Justin Allen Larson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Justin Allen Larson is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Justin Allen Larson was found guilty of Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: 30 days in the Pepin County Jail with huber privileges and no more than 4 hours toward total huber release for child care services.
Concurrent with: Pepin County Case No. 2015CT03 Count 1.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)
charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Justin Allen Larson

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: 17R 000577 - Balance owing on PP paid in full.

ADDRESS INFO for Justin Allen Larson
Current: E6824 270th Ave, Menomonie, WI 54751 United States  (Effective: 03-15-2016)
Prior: W4196 US Hwy 10, Durand, WI 54736 United States

Defendant Justin A. Larson in court with attorney Haley Breese Wright.  Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Agreement reached.  Defendant will plead to count 1 OWI 3rd, dismiss count 2, state w/draws Motion to forfeit bond; plead to count 1 in 15CM53, dismiss count 2; plead to count 1 in 15CM48, dismiss count 2; plead to 15CM27 count 1, dismiss count 2; dismiss citations.  Court advises defendant of charges/max. penalties in 15CT03, Count 1 ; 15CM27 Count 1; 15CM48 Count 1; 15CM53 count 1. Defendant enters plea of no contest to Count 1 in 15CT03, count 1 in 15CM27, count 1 in 15CM45, count 1 in 15CM53.  Plea Colloquy.  Counsel considered collateral changes, no basis.  Court finds defendant's waiver of his constitutional rights and plea done knowingly & voluntarily, accepts pleas and finds defendant guilty of OWI 3rd, 3 counts OAR OWI related; dismiss 14TR594, 595, count 2 of 15CM27, 15CM48, 15CM53 and count 2 in 15CT03. Bond forfeiture motion shown as w/drawn.  Court w/holds conviction until friday at 3 p.m.  in 15CM27 court assesses costs only of $443; 15CM48 costs only $443; 15CM53 costs only $443 and 30 days in the Pepin County Jail, revoke operating privileges for 6 months; 15CT03 find eligible for IDIP program; sentence fine/costs $1694; 65 days jail w/huber, first 48 hrs. w/o release; consecutive to 15CM53; 24 mos. revocation concurrent with 6 mos. sentence; AA/DAP; 12 mos. IID order.  Under the IDIP program 65 days jail reducted to 30 days and defendant complete 60 hours community service.  TTP of $100/mo. com. 1/1/17.  Advised of appeal rights.

Attorney Haley Breese Wright appeared by phone means for Defendant Justin A. Larson.  Defendant Justin A. Larson in court.  Prosecuting Atty Jon D. Seifert appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Resolution reached, request PLEAS date in March.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for March 15, 2016 at 01:00 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Justin Allen Larson
Current: W4196 US Hwy 10, Durand, WI 54736 United States  (Effective: 01-25-2016)
Prior: E6824 270th Avenue, Menomonie, WI 54751

Defendant Justin A. Larson in court. Attorney Haley Breese Wright appeared by phone means.  Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Wright informs she has not heard from her client since last hearing, had forwarded State's offer to him.  Defendant informs he has moved.  Defendant inform clerk of his new address and to contact his attorney this afternoon.  Status conference scheduled for February 1, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Justin A. Larson in court.  Attorney Haley Breese Wright appeared by phone means for Defendant Justin A. Larson. Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Counsel informs court close to settlement.  State sent revised offer to Atty Wright today.  NGP entered on any cases no pleas entered.  STC set.  Status conference scheduled for January 25, 2016 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Justin A. Larson in court.  Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Haley Breese Wright appeared by phone means.  Atty Wright confirms her client consented to her appearance by phone and note she's only appointed by the SPD on case 15CT03, not the other cases, requests matter be set for trial.  Defendant to contact the SPD for representation on other cases.  Defendant to be fingerprinted on the bail jumping case in 15CM53.  Cases to be set for STC.
NOH mailed to Justin A. Larson, E4860 100th Ave, Menomonie, WI 54751 ret'd to sender, not deliverable as addressed, unable to forward.
Posted by CC with GPS.  Combined cash bond in 15CM48 & 15CM53.

Defendant Justin Allen Larson in court.  Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court confirms defendant received copy of criminal complaint, advises of charges/max. penalties and rights.   State requests $2500 cash bond.   Court inquires of Atty Wright if she wishes to address bond as she's not appointed on these cases.  Atty Wright notes defendant was indigent in 15CT03 and asks for Signature Bond.  Court sets $1000 combined cash bond on 2 new cases.
